summary: Have me as a follower. Why? Fuck if I know.
descriptionHtml:
Have me as a follower, no idea why you'd want that. I'm not a marriage partner (taken), and I'm OP as hell (not an ego thing, an effort thing, don't feel like setting him to scale with the player). NPC has untested necromancy, destruction and one-handed skills as well as armor that's bound to break your immersion if you care at all about the quest it's involved in. His axe is unique (if it didn't break in the CK), so steal it if you want.

In the new update, he doesn't use Midas spells so you're good if you don't want buggy OP magic mods.


This was mainly uploaded for my friend, if you're wondering why this exists. Cheers.
author: evilkiller108
